Report.definition: a usually detailed account or statement
Report.origin: [the committee made an unfavorable on the bill]

1 a.definition: to make a written record or summary of [ a case]

sub_terms.b: to make a shorthand record of

2 a.definition: to give a formal or official account or statement of

sub_terms.b: to return or present (a matter officially referred for consideration) with conclusions or recommendations
sub_terms.c: to announce or relate as the result of a special search, examination, or investigation
sub_terms.d: to make known to the proper authorities [the fire]
sub_terms.e: to make a charge of misconduct against [him for harassment]

2.definition: to make, issue, submit, or present a report [the committee will this afternoon]
